schema.default_min_quality_score: float (0-1) minimum overall quality score used when MIN_QUALITY_SCORE is unset
schema.min_allowed: float lower bound for MIN_QUALITY_SCORE env overrides
schema.max_allowed: float upper bound for MIN_QUALITY_SCORE env overrides

dimension_thresholds.trajectory_smoothness: float (0-1) minimum trajectory smoothness component score
dimension_thresholds.task_completion: float (0-1) minimum task completion component score
dimension_thresholds.physics_plausibility: float (0-1) minimum physics plausibility component score
dimension_thresholds.grasp_success: float (0-1) minimum grasp success component score
dimension_thresholds.collision_count: float (0-1) minimum collision-free component score (1.0 = collision-free)

schema.notes: Per-dimension thresholds are enforced only when the episode metadata includes matching quality_components entries.

description: Minimum acceptable quality score for Genie Sim imports. Override via MIN_QUALITY_SCORE if within allowed range (0.5 - 0.95). Per-dimension thresholds apply when matching quality_components are present in episode metadata.
